bug.author: debuggy
bug.summary: tensorboard could not add precommand after toggle it
bug.description:
Repro steps:
In 16 bed, toggle the tensorboard option
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8444268/68179343-713fe400-ffca-11e9-855b-4ef20ca85f80.png></denchmark-link>
open yaml editor and the tensorboard precommand is missing
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8444268/68179318-5ec5aa80-ffca-11e9-845e-236c09f60fb3.png></denchmark-link>
compare with correct yaml:
<denchmark-link:https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/8444268/68179379-992f4780-ffca-11e9-84e4-043003e5b03f.png></denchmark-link>
